about: The company 'Bukhara Natural Product' has been producing cotton fabrics for global use for many years.

title: Home - LLC "BUKHARA NATURAL PRODUCT"

description.para1: Bukhara fabrics, eco bags. Our factory has been producing cotton fabrics for use around the world for many years.
description.para2: This company has been serving customers for 17 years.
description.para3: The main goal of this company is to produce high-quality and cost-effective products.
description.para4: The manufacturing process of this company is completely environmentally friendly.
description.para5: Based on customer demands and offers, any type of cotton raw material can be produced at the enterprise.
description.para6: The company is the official dealer of DongJia weaving machines in Uzbekistan.
description.para7: Currently, more than 80 families are financially supported by the enterprise and contribute to its reputation and success.
description.para8: To meet the demand, 50 weaving looms are continuously operating at high speed.
description.para9: We have the capacity to weave 200-250 thousand meters of fabric per month.
description.para10: Due to high demand from our customers, high-quality eco-bags are produced at the enterprise.
description.para11: The company 'Bukhara Natural Product' is pleased to serve its loyal customers at any time.
